Detailed Description

template<class V>
class BoundingVolume< V >

The BoundingVolume class is an abstract class which can be used to wrap any Bound node in a scenegraph.

BoundingVolumes also wrap around any children the node has. This makes collision detection simple, as the collision detector can simply check for collisions between BoundingVolumes. which are usually of primitive shape.

A BoundingVolume can be both 2D and 3D, and can only accept a Vec2 or Vec3 as its template parameter.

See also:
Bound
BoundingSphere
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0
